        public void setDialogButton(java.lang.String confirm,
                            View.OnClickListener positiveClickListener,
                            java.lang.String cancel,

      • showDialog

        public static void showDialog(Context context,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.String confirm,
                              View.OnClickListener positiveClickListener,
                              java.lang.String cancel,
                              View.OnClickListener negativeClickListener,
                              boolean cancelable,
                              boolean canceledOnTouchOutside,
                              boolean closeBtn)
        Open a confirm dialog
        参数:
        context - context
        title - title of the dialog, pass null or "" if no title is needed
        message - message to show
        confirm - name of confirm button, pass null or "" if no confirm button is needed
        positiveClickListener - click listener of confirm button
        cancel - name of cancel button, pass null or "" if no confirm button is needed
        negativeClickListener - click listener of cancel button
        cancelable - cancelable when press back
        canceledOnTouchOutside - canceled on touch outside
        closeBtn - whether to show close button

      • showDialog

        public static void showDialog(Context context,
                              int titleRes,
                              int messageRes,
                              int confirmRes,
                              View.OnClickListener positiveClickListener,
                              int cancelRes,
                              View.OnClickListener negativeClickListener,
                              boolean cancelable,
                              boolean canceledOnTouchOutside,
                              boolean closeBtn)
        Open a confirm dialog
        参数:
        context - context
        titleRes - resource id of the dialog's title, pass 0 if no title is needed
        messageRes - resource id of the dialog's message, pass 0 if no title is needed
        confirmRes - resource id of the dialog's confirm button, pass 0 if no title is needed
        positiveClickListener - click listener of confirm button
        cancelRes - resource id of the dialog's cancel button, pass 0 if no title is needed
        negativeClickListener - click listener of cancel button
        cancelable - cancelable when press back
        canceledOnTouchOutside - canceled on touch outside
        closeBtn - whether to show close button
